short_summary: Establishment of a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for CORCAN-Correctional Service of Canada for the supply of fabric for seat furniture manufacturing.
description: Supply fabric to produce soft seating furniture as per Annex A requirements.
full_summary:
================================
### 21C11-241356 RFSO - Vinyl Documents

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4451998570-Doc4453596243
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4451998570
* **Sorting Protocol:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Correspondent Status:** Converted

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Title:** Establishment of a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for CORCAN - Correctional Service of Canada
* **Supply:** Fabric for manufacturing soft seating furniture (list available in Annex A)
* **Ordering Details:**
  - Ordering method: "as and when requested" (AWR) basis
  - Ordering Period: One year (1) with potential extension for four (4) additional one-year periods
* **Trade Agreements:**
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Important Tender Dates

* **Publication Date:**  2024-02-21
* **Closing Date:** 2024-05-02T14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-01 (anticipated)
* **Contract End Date:** None (anticipated)

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Mario Lafleur (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Brief Description
 This National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) establishes a contract with a supplier to provide fabric for CORCAN Correctional Service of Canada for soft seating furniture.

**Important Documentation:**
Please check the link to information and required documentation: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18865163?extsite=MTg4NjUxNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18865163?extsite=MTg4NjUxNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (available in both English and French)

**Note:** The tender was originally published as Open Bidding, but it was later converted to Competitive Open Bidding. Also, please note that due to various priorities and conflicting information the Markets solution team is no longer able to provide additional support. Therefore we cannot deliver this bulletin to this distribution list. Whoever receives it please distributes to the intend produc(c)
I guess I didn’t exclude the notes.
